title: This game is trash (because of player behavior)

So all in all i got a 25 game chat restriction all because riot supports Donald trump. and nazis. which i dont. and they dont like that apparently. because as far as i can tell thats the only thing in there that would get me a penalty. and no im not fucking joking.
i have been banned on 2 accounts for bashing racist trump supporters that were throwing racial slurs left and right but no...just go ahead and perma ban me.
i also have been banned on 2 other accounts for saying someone sucks...
for saying someone is trash,
garbage,
stupid,
and just simply not good.
so fuck them. 

:)
honestly its a fucking online game so why the fuck should should i have to watch what i fucking say to some plebs that cant fucking play this god damn game! oh and yet some racist assholes can just say every racial slur in the god damned book. believe me i posted that shit and it got removed before the next day.

but no im toxic because some fuckers got their fucking feelings hurt in a fucking online game cause someone said they FUCKING SUCKED!
fuck you riot! YOU FUCKING SUCK!

replies.body: {{champion:267}} As OP has no desire to actually talk about this ban with those trying to help and is starting in with insults, I will be locking this one up.

Someone may want to get some anger management classes :) 
A simple google search can help you out with that, best of luck there buddy! 
Good luck on the probable ban if this is how you act towards other players.

Also how did you lose this game if you were a diamond/plat player in pre 30 games. Where new players mainly reside. Something doesn't add up, but I'm sure L9 or someone may want to have you :^) get more banned accounts dude, it makes you the coolest.

if someone does something stupid...i may or may not just call them out and say hey! that was dumb!

unheard of....right?
Why are you replying to yourself? We have no idea who you are replying to. I suggest you use discussion view on these boards instead of chronological view.
but chronological...is more...logical.

1) Why the fuck are you replying so much to your own thread?

2) As you can plainly see, "fuck" isn't censored. So the %%%% from your logs wasn't fuck. I'm guessing it was the c-word, which I personally don't think should be that big a deal, but such is life.

3) Don't flame, even when provoked. Advice applicable to many elements of life, not just league. If you simply do that, you'll be fine forever.

>ThisGam3IsTrash: you %%%% (he banned my yasuo)

 Before I even read on, that's not an acceptable response to someone banning your champion. Was it right of them to do that? No, but that's never an excuse to use hate speech such as racism or homophobia. So just know before I even read the rest, any punishment was well deserved for this sentence alone based on Riot's zero-tolerance policy.

> ThisGam3IsTrash: i choose not to listen to these nazis
ThisGam3IsTrash: cause this bitch KALISTA TOOK MY BLUE BUFF
ThisGam3IsTrash: lose for all i care
ThisGam3IsTrash: this game is trash anyway
ThisGam3IsTrash: cause fuck you thats why
>ThisGam3IsTrash: a bunch of trump supporting nazis
>ThisGam3IsTrash: i figured youd be okay kalista
ThisGam3IsTrash: \fucking turd
ThisGam3IsTrash: god this kalista is fucking trash
ThisGam3IsTrash: just look at that trash score

 Wow. So there's a lot to address here. 

 You don't have the right to speak down to your teammates. Just because Kalista stole your buff doesn't mean you get to act this way. Frankly this attitude is disgusting and is pretty much the epitome of toxicity in League.  Even if you didn't use that hate speech in the beginning of the game, the rest of your chat log was more than enough to warrant a punishment. If you aren't belittling others based on their score, you're giving up and just generally being a jerk all throughout the game. 

 You're going to face hardship from both the allied and enemy team, if you can't handle yourself then remove your ability to chat altogether or take a break entirely. If one buff being stolen removed your ability to focus on the game this much, I would recommend re-evaluating your priorities. 

>So all in all i got a 25 game chat restriction all because riot supports Donald trump. 

 **You're lucky** that it wasn't an immediate 14 day ban based on that zero tolerance phrase you used in the pre-game lobby. That was enough to warrant the second-highest level of punishment and instead you got off lucky, so I'd say you should be grateful. 

>and nazis. which i dont. and they dont like that apparently. because as far as i can tell thats the only thing in there that would get me a penalty.


 I'm not even going to tackle the political side of the flame. If you like or dislike Trump, that's cool, but generally Riot's rules are just against being jerks. 

>honestly its a fucking online game so why the fuck should should i have to watch what i fucking say to some plebs that cant fucking play this god damn game! 

 Why should other people have to be subject to constant flame, racism, homophobia, or general negativity in every person they come across? Do you want to flame and needlessly berate your teammates? Play with a premade. That attitude wouldn't fly in most social scenarios and definitely won't fly here.

>oh and yet some racist assholes can just say every racial slur in the god damned book. believe me i posted that shit and it got removed before the next day.

 Definitely not. If someone uses a slur and you properly report them, they'll get punished without a doubt. If you mean you posted that evidence of racism/homophobia here on the Boards, [yes, it would be removed because it goes against our rules. ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/ITFIpNUE)

> but no im toxic because some fuckers got their fucking feelings hurt in a fucking online game

 I've got to be brutally honest here, it seems like you're the one who had their feelings hurt. Please make an effort to change your ways because in your current state, nobody wants you on their team.
this game is fucking trash
Who are you talking to?

> [{quoted}](name=Xidphel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6AdJxkEM,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2018-12-29T23:48:55.734+0000)
>
> Who are you talking to?

They're doing "Chronological order" instead of normal Discussion view.

Yeah you deserved this.

If you even want *any* discussion on this, please use the "Discussion view" instead of chronological. It's default and prevents you from responding to your own thread and confusing everyone.

Please, take a break and think.

I dont say this fast i really dont but dam son you got some issues.
No its not the game its you. It are players like you who gif this game and its community a bad name. If you cant handle your anger dont play this game or even dear blaming it.

>ThisGam3IsTrash: you %%%% (he banned my yasuo)

I love how you tried to justify that part.

>some fuckers got their fucking feelings hurt in a fucking online game

Actually, it's likely they laughed while they hit the report button. Though I gotta wonder, who has their feeling hurt? I see someone calling someone stupid and saying they suck because they lost AND complaining on the boards that they got banned.
